scripts.test:chromium: cross-env BROWSER=chromium ALLURE_RESULTS_DIR=allure-results/chrome npx cucumber-js --exit   --retry 2 --parallel 2 --format html:cucumber-reports.html
scripts.test:firefox: cross-env BROWSER=firefox ALLURE_RESULTS_DIR=allure-results/firefox npx cucumber-js --exit --retry 1 --parallel 2 --format html:cucumber-reports.html
scripts.test:edge: cross-env BROWSER=edge ALLURE_RESULTS_DIR=allure-results/edge npx cucumber-js --exit --retry 1 --parallel 1 --format html:cucumber-reports.html
scripts.test:webkit: cross-env BROWSER=webkit ALLURE_RESULTS_DIR=allure-results/webkit npx cucumber-js --exit --retry 1 --parallel 2 --format html:cucumber-reports.html
scripts.report:all: allure generate allure-results/chromium --clean -o allure-report/chromium && allure generate allure-results/firefox --clean -o allure-report/firefox && allure generate allure-results/webkit --clean -o allure-report/webkit
